node.title: Kyrgios, Kokkinakis beat Kiwi Venus in fiery Aus Open doubles quarter-final
node.description: The Kiwi and partner Tim Putz lost in three sets to Nick Kyrgios and Thanasi Kokkinakis.
node.content: ["Kiwi Michael Venus and doubles partner Tim Putz of Germany have been eliminated from the Australian Open, losing to Australian pair Nick Kyrgios and Thanasi Kokkinakis in the quarter-finals.", "In front of an overzealous home crowd at Melbourne Park, local heroes Kyrgios and Kokkinakis reached the semi-finals with a 7-5, 3-6, 6-3 victory, putting themselves just one victory away from a final appearance at their home Grand Slam.", "The win sees the Australian pair add another scalp to their collection at this year's tournament, with Venus and Putz seeded sixth.\u00a0", "They also defeated the tournament's top seeds Nikola Mektic and Mate Pavic of Croatia in the second round, and 15th seeds Gonzalo Escobar of Ecuador and Greece's Ariel Behar in the third.", "In an even start to the first set, the two pairs largely held serve throughout, until the scores were locked at 5-5 - until Kyrgios and Kokkinakis were able to break serve, and gave themselves the chance to take the first set in the next game, and make no mistake in doing so.", "But in a second set fightback, Venus and Putz rallied from a set down in fashion, and clawed their way to a 5-2 advantage.\u00a0", "Breaking both Kyrgios' and Kokkinakis' serve, Venus and Putz gave themselves the perfect opportunity to level the scores, much to the dismay of the raucous home crowd.", "The Kiwi and his partner failed to capitalise on three set points on Kokkinakis' serve, only to square the ledger one game later, as Venus held serve despite being three break points down.\u00a0", "However, for all of the action on court, the off-court antics of the crowd - encouraged by Kyrgios - clearly impacted the performance of the Kiwi and his partner.", "Such was the level of noise inside Melbourne Park's Show Court Arena, that the crowd had to be asked to allow Venus and Putz to serve without interference.", "Kyrgios in particular took issue with Venus' ball toss before service, remonstrating with the chair umpire that the Kiwi should be called for a time penalty.", "Into the third and deciding set, where Putz's serve was broken by Kyrgios and Kokkinakis, who held serve for a 4-1 lead before Venus held to bring the score back to 4-2.", "As Kokkinakis held serve at 5-2, the Australian pair were just a game away from reaching the semi-finals. Putz held at 5-2, giving Kyrgios the chance to serve for the match.", "And taking a 40-0 advantage for three match points, Kyrgios and Kokkinakis only needed two, as they sealed their spot in the tournament's final four, and sent the home crowd into raptures.", "Kyrgios and Kokkinakis will meet Argentina's Horacio Zeballos and Spain's Marcel Granollers in the semi-final.", "Venus meanwhile will play on at the Australian Open, as he and compatriot Erin Routliffe face France's Kristina Mladenovic and Croatia's Ivan Dodig in the quarter-finals."]
